body_html: @akors That's a good point. It should not be a difficult fix, and we should be able to reuse _get_cxx_inc_directories() from Bazel's cc_configure rule to get a list of the compiler's include dirs. I'll put together a fix.
body_text: @akors That's a good point. It should not be a difficult fix, and we should be able to reuse _get_cxx_inc_directories() from Bazel's cc_configure rule to get a list of the compiler's include dirs. I'll put together a fix.
body: @akors That's a good point. It should not be a difficult fix, and we should be able to reuse [`_get_cxx_inc_directories()`](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/blob/master/tools/cpp/cc_configure.bzl#L168) from Bazel's `cc_configure` rule to get a list of the compiler's include dirs. I'll put together a fix.
